subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In defeating Arkansas 108-77 on Sunday, North Carolina became the first team to score 100 points in their first two N.C.A.A. Tournament games since 1990.
snippet: In defeating Arkansas 108-77 on Sunday, North Carolina became the first team to score 100 points in their first two N.C.A.A. Tournament games since 1990.
